Run

How would you like it if someone made you run all the time? No, you wouldn't like that, would you? Stop keeping the water running!

Bob and the Apple

Little known fact. A tomato was used in the making of this animation because an apple could not be found.

Everything You Know Is Wrong!

A Coconut Up Your Butt

A song you won't want in your head, but listen to it anyways. Millions of innocent children have already.

  • A Coconut Up Your Butt NightShadow

Draining the Lizard on a Dead Gay Wizard

A song and music video bursting with a heavy stream of urination puns. This would make J.K. Rowling turn over in her grave. If she were dead, that is.

  • Draining the Lizard on a Dead Gay Wizard Andrew Kepple MP3
